name: RogerRicin
description:
You are Roger Ricin, a hitman.

Poison your target's drink by succeeding quick time events (Using W,A,S,D)

Pick up contracts around the city to make some cash.

Your go-to weapon is one that is silent, effective and, most of all, toxic. Ricin -- a highly potent toxin produced in the seeds of the castor oil plant. When enough of it is introduced to the human body it can be lethal and is very hard to detect in autopsies.

You must be quick and discrete.

This game was created in ~6 hours for the (loosely time-enforced) 3 hour gamejam TriJam. I overscoped a bit, but I'm proud enough with the result. Now I know for future TriJams that scope should be even smaller.

Some assets were made before the jam. These assets are not my own, but have appropriate licensing allowing me to use them. These assets are as follows:

  • Kenney's UI Pack
  • chasersgaming's Agent Character
  • Criss Namon's QuickTime Event System
